attributes.review: Disgusting app with gross propaganda. Trump will not silence us. Sorry, he’s not even cute, like the log in screen you see whispy hair and it’s just like 😳 makes me wanna throw up every time
attributes.title: If I could give it 0 stars I would

attributes.review: I just want to see what he was going to do but I gave up cuz it’s hard to use this app .so this  why I gave it one star and there nothing much to say that this not helpful .
attributes.title: What to see what is trump planing

attributes.review: I got this app to show my support for Donald Trump! I had much hope! But the app took 2 days to download? Also keep in mind my pet dog is also a trump supporter. Once the app finally downloaded I saw this orange blob on my screen asking for my phone number and private information!🥺I was very scared but I did it anyway. To help myself relax I went on a walk with my dog and across the street there was a orange racist!!! He looked at me and he started yelling inappropriate words at me such as “TRUMP 2020” and “KUNG FLU” I picked up my 59 pound dog and ran back to the house. Only to find out my phone was broken!!! I took my phone over to the sofa and tried to restart it, once it finally restarted I checked on the trump app and then my refrigerator came in and stole my phone and threw a rock at me! Then I fell of the sofa and broke my skull and rib cage. In my time at the hospital I prayed to trump to help me get better. Then the racist case into my room at the hospital and stole my dog! I could not get her back because my ribs hurt.😩Then someone grabbed me and threw me out the window and I landed on my dog, she was wearing and bandanna that said trump 2020 on it. Oh and I better mention that my dog broke her ribs when I landed on her! So we rolled back to the house and we called Donald Trump, we asked him why the app is causing these weird things. He told me that it’s because China is spying on us despite the fact that the CEO of tiktok is in the USA! He’s so smart like that, but anyways. After the phone call my dog grew wings and flew away so I tried to follow her in my car. Then I got into a terrible car crash with the orange blob. He blamed it on me!!!!😡😡😡 and then my rib cage broke even more!! My doctor told me that I had permanent damage that could not be fixed so they are going to put me to sleep forever. Also my dog is till missing!!!🥺I am very tired of Trumps behavior and I no longer support him due to this app. Anyways by the tome you see this I’m probably dead.❤️🥬spinch🥬spinch🥬spinch🥬spinch🥬spinch🥬spinch🥬spinch🥬spinch🥬
attributes.title: Very disappointed (please read)

attributes.review: No bueno. The app layout is messy, everything takes too long to load, and consistently crashes!
attributes.title: Too difficult to use 😠

attributes.review: Okay I was seeing what this app does and it is awful. Do not download. When I first downloaded it I was excited, but when I clicked on it, was soon disappointed by the contents.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: Honestly this app is the WORST! Filled with a bunch of fake news and predators! It gave my device a VIRUS! I AM OUTRAGED!! It kept on asking for A LOT OF INFORMATION... IS CONSTANTLY SPAMMING MY MESSAGES!!! This low quality app is expected though... DO NOT install this app it will MESS up your phone!!!
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS

attributes.review: Oh trump- I’m surprised your administration wants to ban tik tok considering how many little boys and girls you look at on there. Next time, instead of ruining our country and assaulting children, pick up a hobby- perhaps knitting?
attributes.title: Pls for the love of god don’t vote for him- AGAIN.

attributes.review: SUPER SLOW!! I got on and while I was in it, it was very slow and took forever to load! it even crashed a couple times while on it. take it off the App Store.
attributes.title: not good

attributes.review: This app is so bad it made my phone crash several times. The software must be really outdated and it takes up a HUGE amount of storage. I DO NOT recommend this app!
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: Is it just me or when I downloaded this app my home screen turned into a wall and my phone started building a walk around itself
